# gridColor

**Type Property**

The color to use for the optional gridlines, such as those in a table view.

## Declaration

```swift
class var gridColor: NSColor { get }
```

## Return Value

The system color used for gridlines.  For general information about system colors, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/DrawColor/Tasks/SystemColors.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/20000790].

## Table colors

- **headerTextColor**: The color to use for text in header cells in table views and outline views.
- **alternatingContentBackgroundColors**: The colors to use for alternating content, typically found in table views and collection views.
